text: tumase sharaab aur jue ke vishay mein poochhate hai. kaho, "un donon cheezon mein bada gunaah hai, yadyapi logon ke lie kuchh faayade bhee hai, parantu unaka gunaah unake faayade se kaheen badhakar hai." aur ve tumase poochhate hai, "kitana kharch karen?" kaho, "jo aavashyakata se adhik ho." is prakaar allaah duniya aur aakhirat ke vishay mein tumhaare lie apanee aayate khol-kholakar bayaan karata hai, taaki tum soch-vichaar karo.
